section.title: Target audience and prerequisites
section.para: This guide is intended for system administrators and consultants responsible for designing and maintaining logging solutions and log centers. It is also useful for IT decision makers looking for a tool to implement centralized logging in heterogeneous environments.
The following skills and knowledge are necessary for a successful &abbrev; administrator:

listitem.para: At least basic system administration knowledge.
An understanding of networks, TCP/IP protocols, and general network terminology.
Working knowledge of the IBM System i operating systems.
An understanding of the legacy syslog (BSD-syslog) protocol) and the new syslog (IETF-syslog) protocol) standard.
